title: I can't see health bars as I get into the game
body:
I have this bug that happened like 20 times. Most of them on rengar, after the loading screen my whole game is bugged:
-all of my team and the enemy team are on top of each other for each team when i press tab
-i can't see healthbars
-my hud is bugged (can lvl up an ability only by ctrl+ability)
i can't rlly get a screenshot cause i have to reconnect to play. But sometimes the game crashes while i try to reconnect
Ty for taking your time and try to fix this bug :D

replies.body: do you play in full screen or windowed/borderless?  This type of thing can crop up if you alt tab during loading screen.  Playing in window/borderless mode typically helps with this.

It happens when you alt + tab during the loading screen, easily fixed with alt + f4 and reconnect.

Alternatively, you can avoid alt-tabbing till you're in-game.
